Access or enumeration of browser data fi.Data: Windows Event ID 4663, Windows Event ID 4656, Sysmon Event ID 1
Access or enumeration of browser data fi.Action: Monitor Windows Event IDs 4663 and 4656 for access attempts to known browser profile directories (%APPDATA%\*BrowserName*) by non-browser processes. Analyze Sysmon Event ID 1 to identify processes accessing these paths. Use correlation analysis to link process execution with subsequent file access events.

Suspicious processes executing commands.Data: Windows Event ID 4688, Sysmon Event ID 1
Suspicious processes executing commands.Action: Analyze Windows Event ID 4688 and Sysmon Event ID 1 for process creations involving system management tools (PowerShell, WMI) with command lines targeting browser data paths or executing commands known to extract browser data. Use frequency analysis to identify rare or anomalous command line arguments or parent-child process relationships involving browsers and data access tools.
